revised_title: Specific Protection of Opiate Receptor Binding Sites
tldr: The authors discovered that specific protection of the binding sites of D-Ala2-D-Leu5-enkephalin (5-receptors) and dihydromorphine (p-receptors) can be achieved by pre-incubating the homogenate with ligands of high affinity for the respective binding sites. This study provides evidence of the heterogeneity of opiate receptors in the central and peripheral nervous systems.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Neurochemistry and Pharmacology
